special_text:
Recipe [i](Exile this as it resolves with a cooking counter on it. Then you may put an “I”, “II”, and “III” ingredient you own in exile with cooking counters on them onto the battlefield merged as a Saga enchantment with their names, colors, and chapter abilities.)[/i]
[level 3] This card deals 1 damage to any target. You gain 1 life, create a Treasure token, and draw a card. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
notes:
New card — Replaced And Custom-Ordered

Given black has a tutor recipe at mythic that I actually quite like, it makes sense to change the uncommon tutor recipe into a different effect.
